source.name: FY2010 Federal Government Greenhouse Gas Inventory by Agency
source.description: The comprehensive Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Emissions Inventory for the Federal Government accounts for emissions associated with Federal operations in FY 2010. Attached files provide summaries of the FY 2010 aggregate Federal Government and individual agency Scope 1,2 and 3 emissions. The inventories are broken into two data sets: one set of GHG emissions subject to reduction targets, and a separate data set of military operations, law enforcement, and other emissions not subject to reduction targets.
